QuestData.Title: The Blue Dragon Oathstone
QuestData.Description:
The Azure Span has stabilized for now and more blue dragons have arrived... just in time.
It's time to return to the Azure Archives and reclaim the oathstone.
I would request your presence there, $n. You've been a great boon throughout this ordeal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Kalecgos to claim the Blue Dragon Oathstone.
QuestData.RewardText: The Oathstone is empowered once more. There is much to do... but the Azure Span is at least returning to what it once was.
